name: Greenhorn's Cleave
description: A basic attack that anyone who picks up an axe could execute. Not to be used by anyone with decent experience with axes.

name: Horizontal Cleave
description: A standard attack on center mass for the beginner's use. Your baseline damaging move that you can almost always execute.

name: Haft Strike
description: An balanced attack with your hand up the axe's shaft. Your basic poise generation move.

name: Slaying Cleave
description: A powerful downward swing. A strong high poise move with good criticals.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage

name: Close Cleave
description: A swing close to your body for more stability. An alternative to Horizontal Cleave for better accuracy but poorer damage

name: Focus Energy
description: You gather energy to use later. The highest poise generation move in the moveset, forcing you to essentially skip your turn.

name: Sentinel's Cleave
description: An attack while bringing your shield to bear. A rare defensive option for axe users with a shield, potentially replacing Horizontal Cleave at higher poise.
effects: * Gain +1 AC until the beginning of your next turn

name: Twin Cleave
description: An attack with both axes. A replacement for Horizontal Cleave for dual wielding axe users at higher poise
effects: * On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Headchopper
description: An attack aimed at the neck. An alternative to Slaying Cleave with lower base damage but better criticals.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 10 - Deal 2x damage

name: Deathstroke
description: A powerful killing blow named after a master assassin. To be used at very high poise for maximum damage and strong criticals
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 10 - Deal 2x damage

name: Leaping Cleave
description: A strong jump forward to attack. A flexible forward mobility move with respectable power.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage

name: Retreating Cleave
description: An attack while moving backward. A relatively weak backward maneuvering attack.

name: Forge Onward
description: You move forward aggressively. A way to gain a little poise while you maneuver forward.

name: Sharpen
description: You prepare your weapon for combat. An efficient self buff at a low cost. Useful to offset the weakness of your low poise moves or further power your high poise moves.
effects: * Your next attack gains +1 to hit and +1d8 damage

name: Death's Edge
description: Your weapon is primed to kill. A powerful self buff at a reasonable cost. Useful to offset the weakness of your low poise moves or further power your high poise moves.
effects: * Your next attack gains +2 to hit and +2d8 damage

name: Finishing Cleave
description: A powerful finishing move. A strong option to finish off an enemy and continue your momentum.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage
* If this move kills an enemy, ignore this move's poise cost and instead gain +20 poise

name: Violent Cleave
description: An attack on an entire group of enemies. An alternative to Deathstroke for dealing damage to multiple enemies at high poise.
effects: * This attack hits all enemies in the frontline and midline
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage

name: Tomahawk Toss
description: An attack on a distant target with a thrown axe. A respectable ranged option for axe users.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Chaser Cleave
description: An attack on a fleeing enemy. A strong option to prevent enemies from maneuvering backward.
effects: * An enemy who takes damage from this move cannot maneuver backward this round

name: Second Severance
description: A follow up attack to a powerful strike. A fantastic move to use after scoring a critical strike.
effects: * If you successfully executed a critical strike during your last turn, ignore this move's poise cost
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill

name: Shredding Cleave
description: An attack to tear at armor. A strong move to set up for future turns against targets with high AC.
effects: * The target has -1 AC until the end of the next round

name: Shieldsplitter
description: An attack strong enough to split a shield in half. If you can manage to get to high poise, you can permanently deal with an enemy's shield
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Timber Cleave
description: An attack that chops down trees. Useful in forests where many enemies will hide behind them.
effects: * This attack ignores cover provided by trees or other similar narrow wooden constructs and destroys them

name: Axe of the Woodsman
description: An attack invoking the power of the deep forest. A strong move to add to your repertoire when exploring a forest or jungle.
additional_requirements: * You are in a forest biome
effects: * On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - Deal 3x damage
* The target has -1 AC until the end of the next round

name: Axe of the Coastguard
description: An attack invoking the power of the sunny beaches. A unique move that can only be executed under certain circumstances.
additional_requirements: * You are in a beach biome
effects: * On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - Deal 2x damage
* This attack hits all enemies in the backline, ignoring positional disadvantage

name: Tendon Cleave
description: An attack at the vulnerable muscles of the leg. The standard poise damage move for axes, although it requires some luck.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Target loses 15 poise
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Target loses 10 poise
* On Attack Roll of 10 - Target loses 5 poise

name: Vengeant Cleave
description: A counterattack after taking a hard hit. A slightly inefficient standard attack that can act conditionally as an extremely strong counterattack after taking a critical strike.
effects: * If the last attack you received was a critical strike, this attack becomes a critical strike
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 3x damage

name: Butcher's Cleave
description: An attack that kills animals. One of the few moves with special effectiveness against mounted enemies.
effects: * If the target is mounted, deal an additional +2d8 damage and kill the target's mount

name: Recklessness
description: You throw caution to the wind. A long lasting self buff at the cost of some defense.
effects: * Until you fall below 50 poise, you have -1 AC and +1d8 damage

name: Endreaver
description: An attack to end a fight. A powerful move to use on the final enemy, or in a fight with only one enemy to begin with.
effects: * If there is only one enemy present in combat, this attack deals an additional +3d8 damage and has the following:
* On Attack Roll of 10, 11, or 12 - Deal 3x damage

name: Repose
description: You take a moment to breathe. An alternative poise generation option that takes advantage of critical strikes by any party member.
effects: * If you or an ally successfully executed a critical strike since the beginning of your last turn, gain an additional +10 poise

name: Cleave the Ranks
description: An attack at an enemy and his support. A useful way of punishing enemies with strong supportive builds.
effects: * If the target used a move or spell that granted benefits to another target, this attack hits both of them

name: Lancebreaker
description: An attack that leverages the axe's savage superiority over the polearm. A powerful move to counter enemy polearm users.
effects: * This attack has +1 to hit and +2d8 damage if the target is wielding a polearm

name: Undercut
description: An attack at the legs. A rare exploit of a height disadvantage.
additional_requirements: * Your target has a height advantage on you
effects: * If the target attempts to maneuver this round, they fail and lose 20 poise

name: Vanguard Cleave
description: An attack at the enemy frontline. A reliable AOE attack with no poise requirement, with lots of potential if you score a critical strike.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage
* On Attack Roll of 10 - Deal +1d8 damage
* This attack deals half damage to all other enemies in the target's line. If this attack critically strikes, it deals full damage to all other enemies in the target's line instead.

name: Culling Cleave
description: An attack on a cowardly enemy. A strong option if you predict that your target won't attack anyone this round.
effects: * If the target executed a non-attack move this round, this attack deals +2d8 damage and has the following:
* On Attack Roll of 10, 11, or 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Lifesteal Cleave
description: An attack that steals life. A rare option for self sustain if you're lucky.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - You heal for 1d8 health

name: Hook Cleave
description: An attack that pulls an enemy to face you. A strong forced movement attack that makes an enemy vulnerable.
additional_requirements: * Your target is in the midline
effects: * The target is pulled 1 line forward

name: Grievous Cleave
description: An attack that interferes with healing. Useful to punish enemies with natural or magical healing moves.
effects: * The target cannot benefit from healing until the end of the next round

name: Bloody Fuller
description: An attack invented by a god of war. If you have a lot of excess poise, this move can be a great way to try and ensure a critical strike.
effects: * While executing this move, you may spend additional poise. For every 15 poise you spend this way, this attack's critical strike range increases by one value
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 3x damage

name: Challenge
description: You challenge an enemy to single combat. A powerful option for frontline axe users who want to focus on a single target.
effects: * Choose a target. Until you fall below 50 poise, you have the following:
* You have +1d8 damage on the target
* You have -1d8 damage on other enemies
* The target has +1d8 damage on you
* The target has -1d8 damage on other allies
* The target may not swap weapons

name: Linebreaker
description: A powerful attack that forces the enemy back. An attack that can completely redefine the positions of all enemy lines.
additional_requirements: * Your target is in the frontline
effects: * This attack hits all enemies in the frontline
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage
* All enemies who take damage from this attack are pushed backward 1 line

name: Hardened Veteran
description: You confidently face the enemy. A strong self buff if enemies are targeting you with many poise damage attacks.
effects: * Until the end of the next round, enemy attacks that target you that would cause you to lose poise fail. Instead, those enemies take 2d8 damage

name: Retribution
description: You turn pain into power. Good for axe users who find themselves tanking for their party often.
effects: * Until the beginning of your next turn, attacks that hit you that deal at least 1 damage cause your next attack to have +1d8 damage

name: Culling Cleave
description: You get up close and personal. A strong way to gain poise if you are confident in your AC, but note that enemies might choose not to attack you while this is active.
effects: * Until the end of the next round, attacks that miss you grant you +5 poise

name: Weakening Cleave
description: An attack that weakens the entire frontline. A powerful AOE poise damaging move.
effects: * This attack hits all enemies in the frontline
* All targets that take damage from this attack lose 5 poise

name: Meteor Cleave
description: A strong ranged attack. A powerful ranged option that forces you to move and pick up your axe afterwards.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage
* Until the next time you maneuver, you have -1d8 damage

name: Mageslayer
description: An attack against a spellcaster. A strong way to punish enemies who often cast spells.
effects: * This attack has +1 to hit and +2d8 damage if the target cast a spell this round

name: Serrated Cleave
description: An attack that draws blood. The moveset's only option for damage over time.
effects: * Until the end of the next round, the target takes 1d8 damage at the end of each round.

name: Cascade
description: An attack from a master of the axe that crashes into an entire enemy team. Use it whenever you can to chunk every enemy.
additional_requirements: * You have rested at least once since you last executed this move
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 10 - Deal 2x damage
* On Attack Roll of 9 - Deal +1d8 damage
* Your next attack gains two levels of advantage and hits all enemies in combat
